ROBOT FRAMEWORK
---------------

In today's market, the demand for APP or API testing also encompasses the Robot Framework. You can explore an example here:

Use e.g. Git Bash to install the necessary Node.js dependencies (like Playwright) required by the Robot Framework Browser library by following command:

.. code:: text

    rfbrowser init

To run the Robot Framework tests, please follow the link below.

    `Link to run robot framework <../Testing/index.html#how_to_run_robot>`_
